summary: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.
cast: Simon Pegg|Steve Le Marquand|Alice Braga|Teresa Palmer|Sullivan Stapleton|Luke Hemsworth|Callan Mulvey|Bryan Brown|Daniel Berenger|Cody Fullbrook|Anna Philp|Tony Spencer|Kriv Stenders|Veronica Wayte
keywords: hitman|criminal as protagonist|criminal|murderer as protagonist|dark comedy
title: Kill Me Three Times
